TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 提供工作流程事件的資料。

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 與工作流程執行個體關聯的工作流程事件。Workflow events are associated with a workflow instance. 會包含與工作流程事件關聯的 。A contains the associated with the workflow event. 衍生自 類別的 或物件在 類別中提供所有工作流程事件的資料。A or an object that derives from the class provides the data for all of the workflow events in the class. 是 、 和 的基底類別。 is the base class for , , and . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範呼叫事件處理常式方法時，如何使用 屬性取得 物件。The following code example demonstrates how to obtain a object using the property when an event handler method is called. 當 事件發生時，會呼叫此範例中定義的 `OnWorkflowIdled` 方法。When the event occurs, the `OnWorkflowIdled` method defined in this example is called. 它會使用 屬性判斷閒置的工作流程，然後呼叫 方法取得工作流程執行個體之佇列項目的集合。It determines which workflow is idled using the property and then gets a collection of queued items for the workflow instance by calling the method. 此程式碼會在集合上反覆查看，以判斷是哪個活動正在等候閒置工作流程的事件。The code iterates over the collection to determine which activity is waiting for the event that idled the workflow. 然後，它會使用 方法以及事件佇列項目的名稱，將例外狀況傳送到工作流程佇列中。It then sends an exception to the workflow queue using the method along with the name of the event queue item. 這個程式碼範例是 Program.cs 檔案中＜取消工作流程 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Canceling a Workflow SDK Sample from the Program.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[取消工作流程](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d5077f56-a78b-48e7-825c-f6c77c8e54fb)。For more information, see [Canceling a Workflow](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d5077f56-a78b-48e7-825c-f6c77c8e54fb). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#261](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets24.cs#261)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#261](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets24.vb#261)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WorkflowInstance As WorkflowInstance

summary.span: 取得與工作流程事件關聯的工作流程執行個體。

span.span: Gets the workflow instance associated with the workflow event.

value.span: 與工作流程事件關聯的 。

span.span: The associated with the workflow event.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範呼叫事件處理常式方法時，如何使用 屬性取得 物件。The following code example demonstrates how to obtain a object using the property when an event handler method is called. 當 事件發生時，會呼叫此範例中定義的 `OnWorkflowIdled` 方法。When the event occurs, the `OnWorkflowIdled` method defined in this example is called. 它會使用 屬性判斷閒置的工作流程，然後呼叫 方法取得工作流程執行個體之佇列項目的集合。It determines which workflow is idled using the property and then gets a collection of queued items for the workflow instance by calling the method. 此程式碼會在集合上反覆查看，以判斷是哪個活動正在等候閒置工作流程的事件。The code iterates over the collection to determine which activity is waiting for the event that idled the workflow. 然後，它會使用 方法以及事件佇列項目的名稱，將例外狀況傳送到工作流程佇列中。It then sends an exception to the workflow queue using the method along with the name of the event queue item. 這個程式碼範例是 Program.cs 檔案中＜取消工作流程 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Canceling a Workflow SDK Sample from the Program.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[取消工作流程](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d5077f56-a78b-48e7-825c-f6c77c8e54fb)。For more information, see [Canceling a Workflow](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d5077f56-a78b-48e7-825c-f6c77c8e54fb). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#261](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets24.cs#261)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#261](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets24.vb#261)]
